task.title: How to Pick-Up a Package from Mail Services
task.shortdesc: If you are receiving a package to your residence hall through USPS, it will arrive at Mail Services. Otherwise, if the package is UPS or FedEx, it will arrive at your door instead.

step.cmd: Walk to Mail Services. It is located in Owens Hall. If you are having trouble finding it, here is a link to a campus map: http://www.maps.vt.edu/PDF/campus-map-highres.pdf
Approach the counter at Mail Services. When someone arrives to assist you, hand them your Hokie passport and tell them what residence hall you live in

info.note: When I lived on campus, I would hand the assistant my Hokie passport and say "I live in Johnson Hall"

step.cmd: Sign your name on the little screen they hand you
Take your package back to your residence hall to see what goodies you got.
